description: Just when you thought Samuel O'Toole couldn't be any more of a renaissance man, he tells you he welled versed in several wrestling styles!  This guy is unbelievable.  He's hot as fuck, he has a giant cock, AND he can put you in a snug choke hold in a heartbeat.  But Sammy would never do that...unless you were both involved in some kind of amorous activity, that is!  Come join Samuel in the gym as he shows a few traditional wrestling preparatory stretches, as well as a few quick moves to overtake an opponent.  As he explains, Sammy never wore a cup while wrestling, which means his huge dick was swinging free, rubbing around on other hot, sweaty guys during drills.  But whenever he practiced alone, he always made sure to work out his favorite muscle!  Get ready for a sexy, meat-stroking, post wrestling session with the hottest guy that ever hit the mat.Enjoy!
title: Samuel O'Toole's Private Lesson
